column4: Hi I have big problem. After i installed Opera, my internet connection is very slow (browsers) i cant open any website. But thunderbird and xchat works good. Maybe it is because of that there were some errors during installing Opera? Maybe you could tell me how to uninstall it? I installed it with: sh install.sh (i cant uninstall t using dpkg -P opera)
Ok thanks
why can't you install from one of Opera's .deb files?
!+mount
I had a problem cause i am noob:)
!+opera
see the ubotu post a few lines up, and https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OperaBrowser for next time
but I have no idea how to get rid of your current install of Opera, if you installed from source
Funny, I hope i will uninstall it
you could ask on Opera's own forums, there's a very good group of people there

O another problem, i am installing nvida drivers and when i write: sudo gedit /usr/share/applications/NVIDIA-Settings.desktop: but it writes that there is not command called getdit. What is proper one?
sudo: gedit: command not found
what you mean?
simpler check: type "man gedit" at a prompt, please
mars@lunar:~$ man gedit
No manual entry for gedit
that's very odd - gedit is installed by default in Ubuntu, and so is the man page
I didnt delete anything, what schould i do now?
try a couple other default man pages?
o maybe thats because i am using kubuntu?
o and i reasding tutorial how to install nvidia drivers, but i checkegd and i dont have /usr/share/applications/NVIDIA-Settings.desktop
thanks but can you tell me what exactly you mean?
